body: Is there any way we can check if a player has already been banned? I dont want to inconvenience the mods/staff by reporting someone who has already been banned :)
body_tagged: Is there any way we can check if a player has already been banned? I dont want to inconvenience the mods/staff by reporting someone who has already been banned :)
title: Checking Who's Banned for Reports

replies.body:
sure go under the stats of the person(www.avicus.net/<name of the person>)

then go on infractions. Also just do www.avicus.net/infractions to see the resent punishments
replies.body_tagged:
sure go under the stats of the person(www.avicus.net/<name of the person>)

then go on infractions. Also just do www.avicus.net/infractions to see the resent punishments

replies.body:
Go to that particular players profile by avicus.net/playernamehere    and then click the infractions tab. If they have been banned it would have come up with a ban and see whether the expires day is after the current day. If there is no expires day that means it they have been permanently banned

EDIT: ninja'd QQ
replies.body_tagged:
Go to that particular players profile by avicus.net/playernamehere    and then click the infractions tab. If they have been banned it would have come up with a ban and see whether the expires day is after the current day. If there is no expires day that means it they have been permanently banned

EDIT: ninja'd QQ

replies.body:
In-game, you cannot report an offline player. 

In order to see who is banned, you can go to avicus.net/infractions to check who has been recently banned.

For player-specific concerns, you can go to avicus.net/<playername> in order to see the person's profile. Go to the infractions tab and then see if that person has been banned or not. 

I hope this cleared out some questions. :D

replies.body:
I'm confused about this?
How so you report banned players? They can't even log into the server... 
You can only use /report on players in your game
Or do you mean Player Reports on the forums?
